name: New Adventures of Ferocious Z
description:
This game was made for the libGDX Jam 19 of December 2021. My first ever game of any kind and I hope y'all like it! No controls just read click and enjoy!

Note: Extract all before playing k thx bye

Game design, story, etc: DragonQueen

TGMT program creation: Raeleus, TEttinger, Login94

Music: Jake Stevens you can find him at https://youtube.com/user/jakery1295
